DOC.brief_summary: Systematic retrospective medical chart and medical imaging file review of all patients receiving brain MRI for the follow-up of glioblastoma.
DOC.brief_title: MRI Detection of Microbleeds in Glioma Patients
DOC.criteria: Adult patients Diagnosed with brain glioblastoma Receiving treatment with cranial radiotherapy and/or chemotherapy Having at least one followup MRI conducted that used a susceptibility weighted imaging sequence Underage Absence of formal diagnosis of glioblastoma No available medical imaging file with MRI susceptibility weighted imaging sequence
